mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no , p.prod_name , p.prod_detail , p.manufacture_day , p.price , p.image_file , p.reg_date, TRIM(t.tran_status_code) tran_code, c.category_no, c.category_name FROM product p, transaction t, category c WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+) AND p.prod_no = #{prodNo} AND p.category_no = c.category_no
